biography.bio: Antonio Resines was born on August 7, 1954 in Torrelavega, Cantabria, Spain as Antonio Fernández Resines. He is an actor and producer, known for La famille Serrano (2003), Cellule 211 (2009) and A las once en casa (1998). He was previously married to Marisol de Mateo.
biography.name: Antonio Resines

biography.bio: Ana Gracia was born on February 16, 1959 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Ana Gracia Soler. She is an actress, known for C.L.A. No somos ángeles (2007), Nico and Dani (2000) and Camino (2008).
biography.name: Ana Gracia

biography.placeOfBirth: Boadilla, Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain
biography.bio: Santiago Ramos was born on August 1, 1949 in Boadilla, Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain as Santiago Ramos Sánchez. He is an actor, known for Aquí no hay quien viva (2003), El Lobo (2004) and Como un relámpago (1996). He has been married to Paca Almenara since August 2005.
biography.name: Santiago Ramos

biography.placeOfBirth: Castellón de la Plana, Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain
biography.bio: Guillermo Montesinos was born on January 10, 1948 in Castellón de la Plana, Castellón, Comunidad Valenciana, Spain as Guillermo José Montesinos Serrano. He is an actor, known for Los ladrones van a la oficina (1993), Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown (1988) and The Heifer (1985).
biography.name: Guillermo Montesinos

biography.bio: El Gran Wyoming was born on May 14, 1955 in Madrid, Spain as José Miguel Monzón Navarro. He is an actor and director, known for Caiga quien caiga (1996), El intermedio (2006) and El club de la comedia (1999).
biography.name: El Gran Wyoming

biography.bio: Álex Angulo was born on April 12, 1953 in Erandio, Vizcaya, País Vasco, Spain as Alejandro Angulo León. He was an actor, known for Pan's Labyrinth (2006), Le jour de la bête (1995) and Live Flesh (1997). He died on July 20, 2014 in Fuenmayor, La Rioja, Spain.
biography.name: Álex Angulo

biography.bio: Pepo Oliva was born as José Luis Oliva Mayo. He is an actor, known for Les lundis au soleil (2002), Héctor (2004) and Compañeros (1998).
biography.name: Pepo Oliva

biography.birthName: María de los Remedios Barranco García
biography.bio: María Barranco was born on June 11, 1961 in Málaga, Málaga, Andalucía, Spain as María de los Remedios Barranco García. She is an actress, known for Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown (1988), Tie Me Up! Tie Me Down! (1989) and The Red Squirrel (1993).
biography.name: María Barranco

biography.bio: Talented and prolific theater and movie actor from Bilbao, Ramón Barea came to the fore of Spanish cinema in Hitting Bottom (1997) with his memorable role of Juan, a jobless electrician who becomes homeless. It took a great actor to make this xenophobic moaner a likable fellow. Which escaped neither festival jurors (he won two best actor awards, at the Huelva and the Amiens film festivals) nor the directors and producers of his country (he has been in 155 films, TV films and TV series episodes). Not content with this hyper-activity on the boards and in front of the cameras, he has also directed four films, two shorts and two features.
biography.name: Ramón Barea

biography.bio: Carlos Tristancho was born on May 3, 1955. He is known for his work on El Lute: Run for Your Life (1987), Villarriba y Villabajo (1994) and If They Tell You I Fell (1989).
biography.name: Carlos Tristancho

biography.bio: Marisa Paredes was born on April 3, 1946 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as María Luisa Paredes Bartolomé. She is an actress, known for Life Is Beautiful (1997), All About My Mother (1999) and La piel que habito (2011). She is married to Antonio Isasi-Isasmendi. They have one child.
biography.name: Marisa Paredes

biography.bio: Germán Cobos was born on July 7, 1927 in Sevilla, Andalucía, Spain as Germán Sánchez Hernández-Cobos. He is known for his work on Cria Cuervos (1976), La loi du désir (1987) and Linked (1996). He was married to Visitación Peralta. He died on January 12, 2015 in Almuñécar, Granada, Andalusia, Spain.
biography.name: Germán Cobos

biography.bio: Óscar Grijalba is an actor, known for Mirindas asesinas (1991), Mama (1988) and Tu novia está loca (1988).
biography.name: Óscar Grijalba

biography.bio: Luis Marías was born as Luis Marías Amondo. He is a writer and director, known for Tres mentiras (2014), Farmacia de guardia (1991) and Mensaka (1998).
biography.name: Luis Marías

biography.bio: Esther Velasco was born on July 6, 1959 in Bilbao, Vizcaya, País Vasco, Spain. She is an actress, known for Mi querido Klikowsky (2005), La blanca paloma (1989) and Salto al vacío (1995).
biography.name: Esther Velasco

categories.category: Best Movie Actress (Mejor Actriz de Cine)

names.name: Mujeres al borde de un ataque de nervios
Mujeres al borde de un ataque de nervios
